title: Deep Freeze at Flèche Wallonne: Shivering Skjelmose Carried Off Bike with Hypothermia
content:
Only 44 riders finished the 198.6km race after rain and cold engulfed the peloton: 'I was freezing in the last 80km.'

Read the full article at Deep Freeze at Flèche Wallonne: Shivering Skjelmose Carried Off Bike with Hypothermia on Velo.
author: ahood
